front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Specific Requirements - Part 17: Resilient Packet Ring (RPR) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications - Amendment: 2 - Protected Inter-Ring Connection

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment enables a service provider to use the architecture and protocols of IEEE Std 802.17TM to support ring interconnection through dual station homing, providing 50-ms protection, loop preventation, and load balancing of traffic between rings.
